system.effect: A blinded character automatically fails all Tests based on sight (Awareness, ranged attacks, etc.). All melee attacks suffer a -30 penalty. Movement is reduced to Half Move rate.
system.removal: Removed when sight is restored through medical attention, psychic powers, or when the blinding effect ends.
